name: SafeWaze Roofer's Basic Kit
description: Includes full-body harness, 50 ft. lifeline with rope grab, single anchor, and carry bag. Designed for 1926.502 compliance on small jobs.
target_audience_match: Perfect for stressed-out roofing crews who need a plug-and-play kit to pass their first OSHA inspection.

name: Werner Roofing Safety System
description: Comfort-fit harness, 30 ft. lifeline with energy absorber, adjustable D-ring, and anchor strap — built for full-shift durability.
target_audience_match: Great for hands-on foremen trying to keep their crew safe and compliant through multi-day jobs.

name: 3M DBI-SALA Compliance Kit
description: Features an ergonomic ExoFit harness, shock-absorbing lanyard, and reusable roof anchor trusted by pros and inspectors alike.
target_audience_match: Ideal for veteran contractors who need inspection-ready gear that holds up to repeat use.

name: Guardian Fall Protection Kit
description: A no-fuss safety setup for onboarding new hires — with 5-point harness, lifeline, and reusable anchor system.
target_audience_match: Perfect for small crew leaders who just brought on a new roofer and need them OSHA-compliant by Monday.
